name: CDexPatientDemographicsProfile
title: CDex Patient Demographics Profile
description:
This Profile is defined to be [contained](http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/references.html) within the CDex Task Attachment Request Profile or CDex Task Data Request Profile.  It is referenced when additional patient demographic data is communicated for a clinical data request (for example, to verify patient identity for HIPAA compliance regulations).  It is derived from the [HRex Patient Demographics](http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-hrex/StructureDefinition/hrex-patient-demographics) Profile and it constrains the following element to be *mandatory* (min=1):

- A default resource ID of "patient"
- A member ID identifier slice

and the following element to be *must support* (min=0):

- A patient account number identifier slice  

In addition, these *mandatory* (min=1) elements are inherited from the HRex Patient Demographics Profile:

- A patient name
- A date of birth

element.definition: The unique member identifier for this patient.
This is the unique patient identifier assigned by the provider when they submit a Claim or Prior Authorization.
element.comment: The unique patient identifier for this patient.
